entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
